        Parameters:

        Parameters:

      • truncateString

        public static java.lang.String truncateString(java.lang.String string,
                              int bytes)
        Trims and truncates a string to number of bytes. This is useful for example to assure that a string containing international characters can be stored into a database field limit size (VARCHAR(255)).
        Parameters:
        string - is the string to truncate
        bytes - is the number of bytes (not characters) to truncate the string to
        Returns:
        The truncated string or null if the string is blank.

      • isByteLengthLonger

        public static boolean isByteLengthLonger(java.lang.String string,
                         int bytes)
        Tells whether a string's byte length is longer than the specified value or not.
        Parameters:
        string - is a string to check
        bytes - is the number of bytes to compare the string's length with (in bytes, not characters)
        Returns:
        True if string is longer, false if not

      • filterNamedDtos

        public static java.util.List<NamedDto> filterNamedDtos(java.util.Collection<? extends IdentifiableDto> identifiables)
        Get only the NamedDtos of a collection of IdentifiableDtos
        Returns:
        a List with those entries from the passed collection that are NamedDto instances
